content:
Craft an item of type: crimson_slab
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 19}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a crimson slab, I first need to craft some crimson planks. I have a single crimson hyphae in my inventory (at slot 30), so I'll start by moving it into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_slab
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 19}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I've crafted the crimson planks, I can move them to my inventory (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: crimson_slab
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 19}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft a crimson_slab, which requires 3 crimson_planks in the same row of the crafting table. Therefore, I will move one of the crimson_planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_slab

thought: I need to craft a crimson_slab, which requires 3 crimson_planks in the same row of the crafting table. Therefore, I will move one of the crimson_planks from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_slab
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 19}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft a crimson_slab, which requires 3 crimson_planks in the same row of the crafting table. Therefore, I will move one of the crimson_planks from slot 11 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_slab
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 19}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I have successfully crafted a crimson_slab. I will move it from the crafting table to my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
